CONTROLS: W,A,S,D -- Move E -- Pick up object / drop it C -- Throw object SHOOTING: Left Mouse Button -- Blue Portal Right Mouse Button -- Orange Portal Hold any fire button -- Preview portal Mouse wheel while holding down any fire button -- Make the portal bigger or smaller
